Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and benefits that I believe will greatly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. For you, the value proposition is clear - this product is worth more than what you perceive its worth at $80, and I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
